name.description: Provide the name of the recipe.

notes.description: Include any additional notes for the recipe.

prepTime.description: Specify the preparation time in ISO 8601 duration format.

tags.description: List tags associated with the recipe, such as type of recipe (e.g., breakfast, entree, main, side) or other descriptive tags to make it easier to find the recipe.

recipeCuisine.description: Select one or more cuisines that best describe the recipe based on the ingredients and instructions.

suitableForDiet.description: Select one or more dietary restrictions or guidelines suitable for this recipe.

cookTime.description: Specify the cooking time in ISO 8601 duration format.

recipeYield.description: Indicate the number of servings produced by the recipe.

source.description: Provide the source URL of the recipe, if available.

recipeImage.description: Provide the URL of the recipe image, if available.

recipeIngredients.description: List the ingredients required for the recipe. For each ingredient, provide the raw text, quantity, unit of measure, and type of ingredient.

raw.description: Provide the raw text of the ingredient.

quantity.description: Specify the quantity of the ingredient.

unit.description: Specify the unit of measure for the ingredient.

recipeInstructions.description: List the steps to prepare the recipe. For each step, provide the raw text, sequence, and a concise instruction.

raw.description: Provide the raw text of the step.

sequence.description: Specify the order in which the step should be executed.

instruction.description: Provide a more concise version of the raw text. Make it very concise, focusing on the ingredient, key action, and duration. Summarize the key action followed by the detail. Example: <Step summary> - <Step detail>. Bold the step summary and return the text in markdown.

nutrition.description: Provide nutritional information for the recipe.

carbohydrateContent.description: Specify the number of grams of carbohydrates.

cholesterolContent.description: Specify the number of milligrams of cholesterol.

fatContent.description: Specify the number of grams of fat.

fiberContent.description: Specify the number of grams of fiber.

proteinContent.description: Specify the number of grams of protein.

saturatedFatContent.description: Specify the number of grams of saturated fat.

servingSize.description: Specify the serving size, in terms of volume or mass.

sodiumContent.description: Specify the number of milligrams of sodium.

sugarContent.description: Specify the number of grams of sugar.

transFatContent.description: Specify the number of grams of trans fat.

unsaturatedFatContent.description: Specify the number of grams of unsaturated fat.
